name: SEAMLESS_S_NEG_UNIFORM_MCU2
steps: Step 1.: Check the kernel enables min_rev.enforcement.
Step 2.: Load the microcode into the intel-ucode folder.
Step 3.: Trigger the late loading process.
Step 4.: Check the updated information for microcode processing.
summary: Verify the Kernel checks the failure when loads non min_rev supported microcode.
